txt.en: Talk to Aerin inside the lighthouse at Aerthir
Aerin can be found in the lighthouse at Aerthir in southern-central Lebennin.\n\nYou have recovered a great deal of pillage from the marooned Corsairs and should now bring it to Aerin.
Recovered buried pillage near the marooned ship ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Recover buried pillage near the marooned ship ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'They have taken so much from our people...\n\n'I shall keep what you can recover for us here, for I am sure the Corsairs still had more stored away on that ship of theirs. I hope that when this war is over we will see all of these stolen items returned to their owners.'

'The others and I have seen a great Corsair ship marooned on one of the shoals along the Great River.

'Whether they were drunk or simply foolish, the crew is now stranded there with all of their pillage. I would ask that you recover as much as you are able, but leave the Corsairs and let the river claim them!

'There is a small boat on the shore nearby, and it will allow you passage to the shoals. I do not advise swimming, for the current is strong and swift, [placeholder].'
Recovered buried pillage near the marooned ship ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Marooned by a foolish captain, Corsairs have stranded themselves and their pillage on a shoal along the Anduin.
Recover buried pillage near the marooned ship ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Deliver the pillage to Aerin at Aerthir

The marooned ship and its crew can be found to the south-west of Aerthir upon the Anduin. A rowing boat on the shore will allow for swifter passage.\n\nAerin has asked you to help recover pillage from the Corsairs that have become trapped on shoals in the Anduin.
